name: Retròpong
description:
The classic Pong is back, this time with a lot of special effects in a great nostalgic remix for adults and childrens.
Keep an eye on the ball while collecting bonuses and extra weapons to defeat your opponent. Collect as many points as you can to climb the world rankings and have fun !!!

Retropong includes the following features:

- 3 game modes (Arcade, Classic and Free);
- 3 difficulty levels (Easy, Medium and Hard) for each game mode;
- 2 players mode;
- Touchscreen or accelerometer controls;
- Autofire function;
- Customizable HD game graphics in various colors;
- Music and realistic sound effects;
- Worldwide leaderboards.

Retropong is waiting for you, download the app now !!!
